summary: Frontend testing complete for unified login screen fix. All features verified working: 1) App loads without white screen crash, 2) Home page displays listings correctly, 3) Messages/Saved/Profile tabs all show unified AuthPrompt component when not logged in with green gradient left panel and sign-in form on right for desktop, and stacked layout for mobile. Button functionality verified: Sign In navigates to /login with redirect parameter, Browse as Guest navigates to home.
critical_code_review_comments: AuthPrompt.tsx is well-structured with separate desktop and mobile layouts
Uses LinearGradient from expo-linear-gradient for green gradient effect
Properly handles redirect path via query parameter on Sign In navigation
Responsive hook (useResponsive) correctly distinguishes desktop/tablet from mobile
All three tabs (messages.tsx, saved.tsx, profile.tsx) correctly import and use AuthPrompt component
data-testid attributes are present on Sign In and Browse as Guest buttons for testing
test_credentials: None needed for unauthenticated screen testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Unified AuthPrompt component is working correctly across all three tabs (Messages, Saved, Profile) for both desktop and mobile views. The fix for white screen crash (Metro cache corruption) has been verified - app loads without issues. The AuthPrompt design matches the main login screen with green gradient on left panel and sign-in form on right panel for desktop, and stacked layout with gradient header for mobile.
